Sequence Information.Target Organism: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 28 uM), V. cholerae (MIC 7 uM), Gram+ B. megaterium (MIC 7 uM) and B. pumilus TISTR 905 (MIC 7 uM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial effects of novel peptides cOT2 and sOT2 derived from Crocodylus siamensis and Pelodiscus sinensis ovotransferrins
Literature.Author: Prajanban BO, Jangpromma N, Araki T, Klaynongsruang S
